conditions: 6 AM—Kaboom! The upper elevations of Rendezvous Mountain have been blasted with 8" of unadulterated blower over the past 24 hours, supplying you with high-grade materials to showcase your personal powder powers. Prepare for slightly cooler temperatures and mostly cloudy conditions today as we sit inside the calm between two storms. Highs will peak in the upper teens on the deck of Corbet's Cabin and in the mid-30s in the Village. In contrast to your raging dopamine rush, light and variable winds will keep the atmospheric vibe relaxed as they barely breeze above 5 or 10 mph. The pow has returned to merge your white-room dreams with reality. So, embrace the momentary insanity, and don't be too ashamed to let all your friends see. Because when you go ripping by, it'll whip 'em right into a frenzy. -Lege
